titleStmt.title: The prerogative of the monarchs of Great Brittain asserted according to the antient laws of England. Also, A confutation of that false maxim, that royal authority is originally and radically in the people. By Bartholomew Lane, Esq;
titleStmt.author: Lane, Bartholomew.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Bateman, at the Kings-Head, in the Old-Change,

notesStmt.note: Copy has some pages stained, with print show-through; slight print fade.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford.
